Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to pension assignments
Summary: Restricts use of pension assignments and which persons can engage in the business of offering consideration for pensions.
LawCode: Amd §§110 & 410, R & SS L; amd §340, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the banking law, in relation to pension assignments
